item.description: So this blog is now based on Jekyll. The migration was…okay, I guess. I had to roll my own ruby script to do some massaging of the output of the wordpress converter, and I’m still missing a ton of features that I’d like to have back. But we’ll see if I get around to that, or not. Heh.
